author: mikemccand
msg: don't use U+FFFF for 3.x tests; fix silly minor unrelated bug in _TestUtil.randomFixedLengthUnicodeString

author: joern
msg: UIMA-2172 Initial commit of the TextMarker contribution.

author: brett
msg: only take the canonical file on the input path, so we resolve any symlinks (/private/tmp on Mac OS X for /tmp, and similar for storage location of some CI installs), without invalidating the test by modifying the paths either from the properties or from getRoot()

author: hwright
msg: Resolve issue #3969: provide proper cancellation support in the
GUI clients can't rely on EINTR being returned when a user tries to cancel
an operation, as no signal is raised.
